short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save products from any website to your wishlist and share with family and friends

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
WishHub is your personal wishlist manager that works across any website. Simply click to save products you love, add notes, and share your lists with friends and family.

Key Features:
• Save products from any website with one click
• Add personal notes to each item
• Share your wishlist via email or text file
• Clean, modern interface with dark mode support
• Organize all your wishlist items in one place
• Works offline - your items are saved locally
• No account required

Perfect for:
• Holiday gift planning
• Personal shopping lists
• Price tracking
• Sharing gift ideas with family
• Creating shopping collections

Privacy-focused:
• No account required
• All data stored locally on your device
• No tracking or analytics
